concept.title: How to use the Quality Profile API

section.title: Purpose
section.p: This document describes how to use the Quality Profile API to get quality parameter values from the quality profiles defined in the file lbsprofile.ini.

section.title: Using the API
section.p: The code below demonstrates how to use the API to obtain all the values from a quality profile with ProfileID = 1 defined in lbsprofile.ini.
A client uses the static constructor CLbsQualityProfileApi::NewL() to create an API object and defines some variables to store the quality profile values.
A client calls CLbsQualityProfileApi::Get() passing one of the following as the second parameter:

li.p: KLbsQualityProfileHorizontalAccuracy to get the horizontal accuracy in metres
KLbsQualityProfileVerticalAccuracy to get the vertical accuracy in metres

p.b: Getting the times to obtain a location fix or GPS measurements

section.p: A client class calls CLbsQualityProfileApi::Get() passing one of the following as the second parameter:

li.p: KLbsQualityProfileMaxFixTime to get the time to obtain a location fix
KLbsQualityProfileMeasurementInitialFixTime to get the time to get the first GPS measurements
KLbsQualityProfileMeasurementIntermediateFixTime to get the time to get subsequent GPS measurements
KLbsQualityProfileFinalNetPositionLag to get the time required to obtain the final position from the network.
